```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(car)
```


```{r}
sqrt(2) ^ 2 == 2
sprintf("%.99f", sqrt(2) ^ 2)

# Intercepts

# Random seed, and sample size
set.seed(0)
n <- 1000

# Standard amount of noise; SD = 1
x1 <- rnorm(n) # IV
e  <- rnorm(n) # Errors.
y1 <- 2 * 1 - 3 * x1 + e # DV

scatterplot(y1 ~ x1,
            col = "red3",
            smooth = FALSE)

X <- model.matrix(lm(y1 ~ x1))
y1 == X %*% c(2, -3) + e

# Plots
scatterplot(y1 ~ x1,
            col = "red3",
            smooth = FALSE)
```
